channel.title: Rune MTP (634) Loyalty Tags
channel.description: Ok so i have loyalty tags set but only i dont know where i go in order to set them for players because if i give someone an admin rank automatically it gives them "Owner" Marc: just like that and in the download section it says that your able to set them for players induvidually
